analyze-shuffle shuffle01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1)
  outputs: (   R1)
  
analyze-shuffle shuffle02 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3)
  outputs: (   R2,    Rx,    Rx)

analyze-shuffle shuffle03 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:R4)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    Rx,    Rx)

analyze-shuffle shuffle04 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:R4, V4:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    Rx,    Rx,    R4)

analyze-shuffle shuffle05 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:R4, V4:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    Rx,    Rx,    R5)

analyze-shuffle shuffle06 :
  inputs:  (V0:F1, V1:F2, V2:F3, V3:F4, V4:F5)
  outputs: (   F2,    F3,    Fx,    Fx,    F4)

analyze-shuffle shuffle07 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:F4, V4:F5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    Rx,    Fx,    F4)

analyze-shuffle shuffle08 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R4)
  free-reg: R7
  free-freg: F7

analyze-shuffle shuffle09 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:F1, V4:F2)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R4,    F2,    F3)
  free-reg: R7
  free-freg: F7

analyze-shuffle shuffle10 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:R4, V4:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    R5,    Rx)
  free-reg: R7
  free-freg: F7

;Simple cycle.
analyze-shuffle cycle01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2)
  outputs: (   R2,    R1)
  free-reg: R7

;Two simple cycles
analyze-shuffle cycle02 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:R3, V3:R4)
  outputs: (   R2,    R1,    R4,    R3)
  free-reg: R7

;Float cycle
analyze-shuffle cycle03 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V1:R2, V2:F3, V3:F4)
  outputs: (   R2,    R1,    F4,    F3)
  free-reg: R7
  free-freg: F0

;Big cycle
analyze-shuffle cycle04 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R3, V3:R2, V4:R4, V5:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R5,    R4,    R3,    R1)
  free-reg: R7

;Big cycle with standalones
analyze-shuffle cycle05 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R3, V3:R2, V4:R4, V5:R5, V6:R6, V7:R7, V8:R8)
  outputs: (   R2,    R5,    R4,    R3,    R1,    R6,    R7,    R8)
  free-reg: R7

;Big chain with free register
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R3, V3:R2, V4:R5, V5:R6)
  outputs: (   R2,    R5,    R3,    R6,    R7)
  free-reg: R8

;Big chain without free register
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R3, V3:R2, V4:R5, V5:R6)
  outputs: (   R2,    R5,    R3,    R6,    R7)

;Cycle and chain with free register
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:R4, V5:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    R5,    R6)
  free-reg: R8

;Cycle and chain without free register
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:R4, V5:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    R5,    R6)

;Cycle and chain with useless free register
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:R4, V5:R5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    R5,    R6)
  free-freg: F0

;Cycle and chain without free register. Chain is different type.
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:F4, V5:F5)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    F5,    F6)

;Cycle and chain without free register. 
;Chain is different type.
;One standalone.
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:F4, V5:F5, V6:R4)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    F5,    F6,    R4)

;Cycle and chain without free register. 
;Chain is different type.
;One standalone.
;Saved standalone.
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3, V4:F4, V5:F5, V6:R4 (saved))
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,    F5,    F6,    R4)

;Cycle and chain without free register. 
;Chain is different type.
;One standalone.
;Saved cycle.
analyze-shuffle chain01 :
  inputs:  (V0:R1, V2:R2, V3:R3 (saved), V4:F4, V5:F5, V6:R4)
  outputs: (   R2,    R3,    R1,            F5,    F6,    R4)
